Small_Description-Data: focused on Data Science and Machine Learning. Through classes, events, study groups and lectures, the entity's mission is to unite the industry, the academic world and interested people, so that everyone can create important connections for their life and career while learning.

Sponsors_Description: Institutions that believe in the project
FrontsSection: SECTION: These are the texts present in the FrontsSection
Fronts_Description: Data ICMC's fronts are fundamental pillars that structure and organize our group's activities. Each front is responsible for a specific area of ​​activity, working in a coordinated manner to achieve our goals of promoting knowledge in Data Science and Machine Learning. Through these fronts, we seek to provide an enriching experience not only for members, but also for the community, allowing them to develop their skills, collaborate on projects and establish valuable connections.
Fronts_Description_2: Below are the different fronts of Data ICMC and how each contributes to the growth and strengthening of our group:
Study_Groups_Description: In study groups, students meet with the aim of delving deeper into a topic. At the end of their studies, members come together to present results and projects to the rest of the group.
Projects_Description: The project front aims to bring together groups to develop applications involving everything from obtaining data to development, training, in addition to visualizing results.
Events_Description: Organizes Data Science events such as DataDay. In addition, it represents the group at opportunity shows, Congresses and Summer Schools.
Marketing_Description: Marketing aims to promote the group, attract new people through the social networks where DATA is present.
Secretariat_Description: The Secretariat takes care of the group's relationship with USP, facilitating bureaucracy, organizing documents on Github and Drive. It also represents the group in General and Board Assemblies.
Teaching_Description: The Teaching department organizes courses with the aim of presenting the area of ​​Data Science, both as in-depth courses.
